summary: Rebel embodies the spirit of unconventional thinking and action in the digital realm. It encourages users to challenge the status quo, embrace creativity, and maintain the web's unique character. This concept is closely tied to keeping the internet weird, diverse, and free from excessive standardization. It promotes open-source principles, digital fabrication, guerrilla-style creativity, and digital ownership. By adopting a rebel mindset, individuals can contribute to an innovative, empowering, and distinctively quirky online environment that resists corporate control and homogenization.
excerpt: Keep The Web Weird by engaging with ISOC for internet advocacy, embracing open-source principles, exploring digital fabrication, adopting guerrilla-style creativity, and championing digital ownership. These steps promote innovation and diversity online.
